archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files
1968-1999

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions apply to personally identifiable student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-18/2/1.991, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library in 1999 August.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Topical files from Dean Robert T. Canevari's office, including the files of the V. Shamim Sisson, Associate Dean of Students; Michelle A. Samuels, Assistant Dean of Students and F. Aaron Laushway, Assistant Dean of Students. Included in the collections are audio tape interviews with University presidents and files on fraternities and sororities.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: Dean of Students, Robert T. Canevari Boxes 1-9
Series II: Associate Dean of Students, V. Shamim Sisson Boxes 10-18
Series III: Assistant Dean of Students, Michelle A. Samuels Box 18-21
Series IV: Assistant Dean of Students, F. Aaron Laushway Box 22-34
Series V: Restricted Files Box 35
